actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to treat great-grandchildren, nieces, and nephews in the same manner as grandchildren in applying the one-year dependency test to adopted children in determining entitlement to child's insurance benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to treat great-grandchildren, nieces, and nephews in the same manner as grandchildren in applying the one-year dependency test to adopted children for purposes of determining eligibility for child's insurance benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to treat great-grandchildren, nieces, and nephews in the same manner as grandchildren in applying the one-year dependency test to adopted children in determining entitlement to child's insurance benefits.
